name: QDMR
summary: A universal codeplug programming software for DMR radios.
description: qdmr is a Qt5 application to program DMR radios. DMR is a digital modulation standard used in amateur and commercial radio. To this end, qdmr is an alternative codeplug programming software (CPS) that supports several radios of several manufacturers. Including AnyTone AT-D868UVE, AT-D878UV, AT-878UVII, AT-D578UV, TyT MD-390, MD-UV380, MD-UV390, MD-2017, Retevis RT8, RT3S, RT82, Radioddity RD5R, GD-77, Baofeng DMR-6X2 and radio running the OpenGD77 firmware.
